articles.title: Attention thyroid medication users! Abbott issues urgent recall on mislabelled batch – Check yours now - Telangana Today
articles.description: Abbott India in its latest public notice revealed that it has issued a voluntary recall of a particular batch of Thyronorm tablets due to labeling error in Madhya Pradesh and Telangana.
